page.title: 06HOUSES-NEW
page.content: Most houses are relatively new,many of the houses are built for commuters.An average of 75% of the adults are commuters.White Post Fields has just been built.The man who is financing in the building of the houses is Mr Ellis.His family have owned the land for many generations.Numerous developers are arguing about building on farmland,as it is a green belt area.The only other built up area is High Wych and the rest of the land is farmland. Many houses are detached or semi detached three bedroomed.They have a garage and two gardens.There is a living room,dining room,bathroom and kitchen.
